meanings.definition: Located or situated by the beach.
meanings.sent1: The beachside resort offers stunning ocean views.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed a relaxing day at the beachside cafe.
meanings.sent3: The beachside seagulls seem to enjoy people-watching.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a beachside sunrise.
meanings.sent5: The beachside breeze carried the scent of salt and sand.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the area next to the beach.
meanings.sent1: The beachside community organizes clean-up events.
meanings.sent2: The beachside path is perfect for a leisurely stroll.
meanings.sent3: The beachside volleyball tournament was a sandy success.
meanings.sent4: His beachside attitude is always calm and carefree.
meanings.sent5: The beachside sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
